And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> and sealed <S%H2856><s%> it with the king's signet <S%H2885><s%> ring, <S%H2885><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> by couriers <S%H7323><s%> on horses, <S%H5483><s%> riding <S%H7392><s%> on steeds <S%H7409><s%> sired <S%H1121><s%> by the royal <S%H7424><s%> stud. <S%H7424><s%>

on one <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the provinces <S%H4082><s%> of King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus, <S%H325><s%> the thirteenth <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%> [day] of the twelfth <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> (that is, the month <S%H2320><s%> Adar <S%H143><s%>).
